include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (CHIRP_ARCHIVE "${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/build/lib/libchirp.a")
set (DTTOOLS_ARCHIVE "${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/build/lib/libdttools.a")

register_external_lib (libchirp ${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${CHIRP_ARCHIVE})
register_external_lib (libdttools ${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${DTTOOLS_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/build/include")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${CCTOOLS_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/build/include")
